## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | Ordering 15,000 units ensures sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand, considering a margin of error. This minimizes the risk of stockouts and allows for flexibility in meeting potentially higher demand. It also takes advantage of the available vendor order quantity, allowing for a single order instead of multiple smaller orders. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  The recommendation is equal to the player's planned order quantity. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  ~3.5 days                              |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  ~5.5 days                              |
| Comments                          | This recommendation provides a balanced approach to inventory management, ensuring adequate stock while considering the discount threshold and vendor order quantities.  |
